AboutInji.aboutDetails: Inji is a mobile app that can be used as a digital wallet to store credentials. It also allows identity verification in both offline and online modes, at any place and time.

IssuersScreen.title: Add new card
IssuersScreen.description: Please choose your preferred issuer from the options below to add a new card.

noInternetConnection.title: No internet connection
noInternetConnection.message: Please check your connection and retry

biometricsCancelled.title: Do you want to cancel download?
biometricsCancelled.message: Biometric confirmation is required to continue downloading the card.

generic.title: Something went wrong!
generic.message: We are having some trouble with your request. Please try again.

HelpScreen.detail-1: A digital credential is the digital version of your physical Identity card
HelpScreen.whatCanDoWithDigitalCredential?: What can we do with digital credentials?
HelpScreen.detail-2: You can avail various Government and private services using your digital credentials.
HelpScreen.detail-3: To add a card, click on '+' button on the Home page and select the appropriate option.
HelpScreen.detail-4: Swipe left on the card > click on More > Remove from Wallet
HelpScreen.detail-5: Yes, you can add multiple cards to the wallet by clicking on '+' button on the Home page.
HelpScreen.detail-6: Click on 'Share' button and scan the QR code from the requesting party. Once the connection is established, the card will be shared.
HelpScreen.howToActivateCardForOnlineLogin?: How to activate a card for online login?
HelpScreen.detail-7: After successfully adding a card to the wallet, click on 'Activation pending for Online login' on the card. On clicking on 'Activate', the card will be ready to be used for online login.
HelpScreen.detail-8: On the Home page, click on 'History' to view the details of the user's activitie.
HelpScreen.whatCanDoBiometricsChanged?: What happens when Android keystore biometric is changed?
HelpScreen.detail-9: The Android keystore holds important information like private keys for identity proofs. When you change your biometrics, old keys are no longer safe. To keep things secure, we remove identity proofs signed by those old keys. You can simply download your identity proofs again, and they will be signed with the latest, safer keys.

OnboardingOverlay.stepOneText: Keep your digital credential with you at all times. Inji helps you manage and use them effectively. To get started, add cards to your profile.
OnboardingOverlay.stepTwoText: Store and carry all your important cards in a single trusted wallet.
OnboardingOverlay.stepThreeText: Share your cards securely in a hassle free way and avail various services.
OnboardingOverlay.stepFourText: Authenticate yourself with ease using the stored digital credential.

ReceivedVcsTab.noReceivedVcsText: Tap on Request below to receive card
